titleNullable: National Stock Exchange India All Tickers Data
subtitleNullable: To Evaluate Stock Performance, Make Prediction or To Create Financial Portfolios
descriptionNullable:
### Context

National Stock Exchange (NSE) - Daily Financial Data from January 1, 2015 to January 15, 2021.

### Content

I also have added a CSV file that contains all of the National Stock Exchange (NSE) ticker (stock) names and their Yahoo Finance equivalent ticker codes  as on January 15th, 2021. (https://www.kaggle.com/ianalyticsgeek/nse-tickers-their-yahoo-finance-equivalent-codes)

### Column Description

**There are total of ~1666 columns out of which ~1665 would be the ticker names (stocks) and the last column is the 'Date' column.**

You might need to remove '.NS' from all the column names, except 'Date' column. And also the name of the date column in 'all_stock_closing_price.csv' file is 'date' and in all the rest (below) files, the name will be 'Date'.

### File Information

There are total of 6 CSV files:

    -     Daily Open prices of all the stocks listed on National Stock Exchange (NSE) India
    -     Day's High prices of all the stocks
    -     Day's Low prices of all the stocks
    -     Daily Close prices of all the stocks
    -     Daily Volume traded for all the stocks
    -     Daily Adjusted Close prices of all the stocks


### Acknowledgements

NSE India and Yahoo Finance websites


### Inspiration

Data can be used for various machine learning techniques to evaluate stock performance or to create best stock portfolios.
